attributes.action: Stop the promotion of anorexia and bulemia online make this a crime
attributes.additional_details:
Please stop the online sites and online postings
Of pro-anorexia and pro Bulimia giving advice
And encouraging eating disorders..anyone
Posting on these sites should be reported
To the police immediately as eating disorders
Kill anyone encouraging this is technically
Committing murder..I call for a change in the
Law to stop this by removing all pro eating
Disorder websites and for the law to be changed so that this is made into a crime!! We
Have a duty of care to protect our children and so do you. Let's fight this together.
